review_text: The cottage was immaculately clean and in a peaceful, quiet neighborhood. It felt very relaxing and homey.

Paul was great. Checked in on us within an hour of entry to ensure everything was good. Provided info during our stay and stayed in touch to ensure we had what we needed. The house was perfect for our needs and close to our event. Perfect stay for a few days with family.
We really enjoyed our stay and would recommend this house to anyone. Great hosts! Very clean and comfortable stay with great views!

Paul thank you very much for your hospitality. Your AirBNB was everything and more. If in the future work calls me into your neck of the woods.I will definitely stay with you if that is an option. Take care of my friend and God bless!

Paul was an excellent host. I had trouble getting the lock numbers entered and I called Paul, he answered immediately. We were able to check in earlier than expected. House was clean and had that homey feeling. Beautiful back yard.
We would definitely stay there again.

Paul did a great job at hosting my family while they were in town for my graduation! They really enjoyed their stay and said his place was very clean and he made sure they were comfortable. Thanks Paul!
Great place and a good location. Paul was very responsive and helpful throughout the stay.
Paul was very responsive (even while out of the country)! The house was very clean & comfortable. We thoroughly enjoyed the fire pit & s’mores kit! Very convenient location. We would stay again!
Paul was easy to communicate with. He asked two or three times if everything was okay at the house. Obviously wanted to make our stay there pleasant.
very clean, nicely decorated, close to many areas. will definitely stay again.

This was a great spot for our family of 6 while visiting ETSU for a tour!
Excellent attention to detail by the hosts, with lots of things to make travel easy and fun.
Paul was very responsive and the house was clean and exactly what we needed for a comfortable stay. Nice views of the woods and convenient to Kingsport.
Nice place

Paul's place was very convenient to the location we were attending a conference. It was well maintained and comfortable. Paul very promptly and graciously responded to a question we had at check-in. We hope to stay at the Cottage at Meadowview when in Kingsport again.
Great value!!
Perfect!
My group felt very comfortable in Paul's place. The area is very nice and quiet

I highly recommend Cottage at Meadowview for a home away from home when in town. I have family in Kingsport and the location could've been more perfect. The home was very accommodating for my family and myself. The home was very clean and the beds were really comfortable after a long day of visiting the town and family. Paul was always available if I needed anything and also let us check in a little earlier then 3:00 The price was reasonable and worth it. Your next stay should be at Cottage at Meadowview in Kingsport, Tennessee!!
Paul was super communicative. When we arrived the smoke detector was chirping, he promptly came over and replaced the battery! Everything else was wonderful!!
The house was perfect for an extended stay. Had everything needed to feel like we were at home. Lots to do without driving far.
This place amazing! Very clean, spacious, and well kept. The covered back porch was my favorite place to be.

The house was just as described. Paul was more than attentive and helpful. He offered early check in just because the house was ready and also let us stay just a bit past check out without hesitation. The home is very clean and charming. Our family enjoyed the stay and would stay again if ever back in the area.
A very nice and comfortable place to stay. ￼
Quick trip up for a fishing trip and only spent one night, but perfect for our needs. Convenient location, clean and welcoming. Thanks, Paul!

Had a great stay at Paul's place. Beautiful home looks just like photos. Paul was easy to get ahold of and made sure we had everything we needed. Will definitely choose to stay here next time we are in town!

Paul’s place was amazing! It was exactly what we needed, as we were at a conference at the Meadowview conference center right up the road. Could not have asked for a more convenient place to stay and have someone babysit our kiddos while we were away. The house was clean, cozy, and welcoming, and Paul went out of his way to extend both our check in and check out times to meet a conference schedule.
nice little cottage we just wish the weather would have been better for using the firepit
Wonderful stay, great hosts!
Paul's home was lovely and so welcoming. It was a blessing to be able to stay so comfortably so close to all my TN family and have room to host them.

In a word—stellar! The cottage was beautiful and cozy, making the perfect location for our holiday gathering. They even had a Christmas tree and festive holiday decorations. The home was very clean, well cared for and pet friendly. The well-appointed kitchen had all the essentials for meal prep. The outdoor space was ample, peaceful and fenced in. They even had a fire pit and provided ingredients for s’mores! Paul was very responsive and made sure we had everything we needed. Check-in/check-out was super simple too. We all had a wonderful stay and look forward to returning in the future!

Enjoyed the cottage! Decorated for Christmas which gave it a really "feel like home" touch. Loved the back porch and the fire pit which we had fun making hot dogs and smores. Plenty of room for our family. Had everything there that we needed. Great location for us for going to our daughter's wedding in Gray, TN. Check in was easy and cottage was very cozy.
This place is amazing, so comfortable and convenient The covered porch was awesome. Definitely booking again.

The stay at Paul’s property was absolutely scenic and cozy! Paul was very flexible with travel arrangements and was very responsive! The house was cozy and warm, easy to find and was close to a lot of stores! Will be returning!

Our stay was absolutely wonderful. It was a home away from home. We had a busy week planned with family and this was the perfect place to come home and relax. It was beautifully decorated with Christmas decor and smelled wonderful when you first walked in. Everything was really clean, and all the linens smelled amazing.
I needed to make some thanksgiving sides for our family and the kitchen was fully stocked with pots and pans, and all sorts of things that I had forgotten to bring. If we even need to stay in the area again we will 100% be checking here first to see if it’s available.
The house was well lit, clean, and very comfortable. We enjoyed it and had a great stay! Would definitely stay again.
We had a great stay!
It was a great place to stay. Very clean and perfect for our stay
This was a beautiful home exactly as described. Paul was a very friendly and attentive host. We plan to be back.

This cozy cottage is the perfect place to stay! It’s clean, comfortable, and has a beautiful yard. Paul is a very responsive host and was quick to answer any questions I had. It’s close to many things, including beautiful Bays Mountain and Eastman Cabins. We would definitely stay here again! Can’t recommend enough.
Great place for a quick getaway. Close to several state parks and other attractions. Good restaurants and shopping close by. Paul is a great host.
Great, clean place
Great place to stay. Thank you for hosting us!

Very comfy “cottage” with back deck and fire pit area, which was set up and came supplied with SMores makings. Paul made sure everything was in working order and that I had no problems with anything. Very, very good host!!!
Great home, clean and convenient!

Paul and Pam were wonderful hosts! They have such a beautiful, comfortable house and we really felt at home here. We look forward to our future stays at this property! They went above and beyond to accommodate us and we can’t thank them enough!
We loved our stay here! The home was clean and cozy! My kids thoroughly enjoyed the s'mores kit. This will be our new "go to" spot when visiting family!

Thank you for hosting our family from out of town who came for our daughter’s wedding. Your cottage was very clean, welcoming, spacious and most of all location was very accessible and close to our own home which made it very convenient for them to see us.
Exceptional communication! Loved the back deck and view.
My stay at Paul’s was amazing
Nice cottage, very clean. Great location to attend event at Convention center.
Had a great stay at this beautiful cozy house. Quiet and tranquil location. Paul was incredibly responsive and made everything go smoothly. Would definitely stay here again.
We had a great time and will be back

The property was exactly as described, very clean and comfortable, and was exactly what we needed. Instructions were simple and easy to follow. The host was nearby and very responsive. It was a great place!
Great spot to stay when visiting family in east TN.
Fantastic stay. Paul is very friendly and we really enjoyed the home. 10/10 recommend if you are in Kingsport.
Very relaxing stay, the house was super clean and well stocked kitchen with coffee k-cups with ingredients to make s’more’s. Will definitely stay again. Thanks again Paul.
This was our second stay. We absolutely love this place and will be back again. Everything described is as it shows. The back deck is a great place to spend cool morning air.

My husband and I stayed at Paul's house while we were in the area for the NHRA Thunder Valley Nationals. They were such attentive and gracious hosts! The house was pristine. The couch and chair in the living room were extremely comfortable. There was plenty of hot water and good , strong showers. They had lots of giant , fresh, soft and thirsty towels. The beds were fresh , and so comfortable! The front yard was neatly landscaped, and was fenced securely with plenty of room for our furbaby. The back yard was green, sloping and beautiful. Sitting on the back porch watching deer walking around in the evening was a joy. In the mornings , we enjoyed sitting on the front porch , drinking coffee, and listening to the chatty goats , and the rooster across the road. It was like being on 2 vacations- we hope to be able to stay at Paul's house again.
Paul’s place was very nice, clean and had multiple bathrooms which was great! Haha. We will definitely stay here again when in the area and highly recommend this AirBnB!
Very nice place. Would definitely book again!
Paul’s place was great. He was a super friendly host and even brought us extra blankets! We would definitely stay again.
Perfect place to stay in Kingsport! House was cute and everything was perfect! Paul is an awesome host! Will definitely stay again!!!

What a great little house! It was immaculate and comfortable. Also, can't say enough good stuff about Paul. We drove in from Texas (an 18 hr. drive) and got into town very late (1:30 am). We had a slight issue with getting in the door, so I had to call Paul. He answered on the first ring, got the issue straightened out, and got us in within a minute or two. I felt bad having to call that late, but he was gracious and friendly. I can't recommend this place highly enough!

We loved staying here. This was one of our favorite Airbnbs we've ever stayed in! The yard and front porch were so lovely for our young daughter and dog. The back deck was so pretty and peaceful for morning coffee. The house was super clean and had lovely southern charm. Thank you for the great stay!
Very clean, beautifully decorated. peaceful backyard.
Great place. Comfortable and clean. Beautiful surroundings. Great host!
Paul was very nice and proactive, we had absolutely no issues with this stay.
This house and host are absolutely amazing!! We had an amazing fire and we're able to sit on the deck and enjoy nature. I absolutely recommend this place if it's available!
Had a great stay! House was beautiful and we felt right at home. Fenced in front yard and large back yard perfect for our dog too. Paul was an awesome host! We highly recommend his place!
Very pleasant and relaxing. Welcoming atmosphere. Beautiful home and surroundings.

This cottage or small house was a great value. Much more pleasant than staying in two hotel rooms with our large family. The house was immaculate, easy to find and just what we needed. We wish we had more time to enjoy the outdoor covered back porch and the fire pit. Maybe next time! We won’t hesitate to book again.
Everything was wonderful. I can't wait to stay here again. Loved the view off the deck!

Our host was great! the place was excellent. the host kept in contact with us throughout the week if we needed anything. The house was exceptional we will definitely stay again. we love sitting out on the porch deck. fire pit was awesome. it was great to have use of the washer and dryer thank you very much. the house Decor was very homey and unique. everything was comfortable. we will be back in early summer.

Great place to stay. Host is very friendly and checked in a few times while we were there to make sure everything was going well. Very clean.
Loved that the lock is a code and didn’t need a physical key.
It was very convenient for a family gathering and exactly what we needed. It met all my expectations and will definitely return for the next eventful visit.

Such a lovely home in a beautiful setting. It was a perfect fit for our needs. Added extra was the outdoor space which included a fenced in front yard, perfect for my grandkids to hide Easter eggs, a huge back yard to run in and a firepit. If you are in the Kingsport area, it is super convenient to I-26 and minutes from dowtown Kingsport. Very clean and Paul, the host, was very attentive. I would definitely be booking again.
Paul’s Place was beautiful and very quiet. Fire pit was Nice for a late night fire, and s’mores! Definitely would stay again!

What a wonderful place!! Perfect for our needs and we would absolutely stay again. Paul’s communication and hospitality is 5 star quality for sure. Every possible thing you could think of to make your stay comfortable was there. Great location with all the Kingsport favorites super close.

We would stay here again! Clean, tidy cottage with everything we needed. Paul is kind, friendly and gracious. I loved the attention to detail such as coffee keurig pods, a snack basket, cute signage (“towels for your four legged friend”). It is so cutely decorated - just like the photos! Easy parking. We had a relaxing get away!

the house was warm and welcoming when we got there. everything worked like it was supposed to a long with everything was clean and ready for use. it had a nice firepit out back, but it was little to cold to go out (32degrees). we look forwarded to staying there again in the future.
Perfect!service

Paul was proactive and responsive. The house was just as described and seen in the photos. Was able to bring our senior dog along and the host was very accommodating of our needs. No concerns.
Great convenience to the Aquatic Center. I highly recommend to anyone who has a swim meet at the Kingsport Aquatic Center.

Paul’s place was perfect for our visit to Kingsport to attend our daughter’s college swim meet. It was located right off of the interstate and easy to find. Paul was very helpful and hospitable during our stay, making sure we had the comforts of home available to us. He made suggestions of local restaurants, grocery stores, and a walking trail (Bay Mountain Park, Lakeside Trail) that were all located close by. We took advantage each one. The cottage was beautiful, VERY clean, and had lots of character and charm. The backyard view was very peaceful, and if the weather had been cooperative, we would have loved to have been able to enjoy the fire pit. My husband and I enjoyed our stay and would definitely recommend it. Paul was a pleasure to work with and made our first Airbnb experience and excellent one.

Paul’s, place was very nice and welcoming.
I felt like I was right at home, the surroundings was quiet. As I set on the back covered porch reading
It’s with in 10-15 minutes of Bays Mountain or restaurants in town
I would definitely stay here the next time I’m in Kingsport
Mike S.

This property is beautiful and in a secluded spot. Although, it isn’t very private due to other homes on the property. We also saw deer and turkeys right outside during our stay.
Danny was very responsive and welcoming. We rented both the house and cottage for attending my son’s wedding. Every amenity that we needed was found in addition to welcome snacks! The home was immaculately clean. Danny was very flexible with our changing arrangements.
I highly recommended this property for staying in and around Kingsport.

If you are considering booking, do it! It books quickly and your selected dates may not be there if you go checking other listings. You won’t find a better stay or better value in the Kingsport area. The home is spacious for a couple or family, and well equipped with towels, linens, kitchen items, and a treat basket here and there. Danny is a perfect host - close by and available if you need him, but leaves you to your privacy otherwise. Be sure to take time to enjoy the Bays Mountain surroundings, whether from walking the property or relaxing on one of the available decks!
Stellar in every way. Quiet. Convenient to everything in Kingsport. Lot of house for the money. Great Wi-Fi signal if you need to work. Elite customer service.

The space was exactly as shown and listed. Our host Danny was super responsive to all our questions and requests. The house was very clean and stocked with everything we needed. We would definitely stay here again and recommend to anyone!!!
Enjoyed my second stay …. Great place for me and My family to stay together … excellent communication from host
This was my second stay at Danny’s place & it was just as nice as last time. My grandson calls it Gaga’s Tennessee house. There’s plenty of room & the beds are so comfortable!! We’ll be back!

our visit to kingsport was enjoyable,but having a beautiful place to return to was the rewarding experience .kitchen has stocked full of dishware. bathrooms plenty of towels .overall very comforting home .can't wait for next stay in kingsport

Loved Danny's Place!!!! Highly recommend to anyone wanting a beautiful quiet getaway in the Kingsport area!!! Beds were super comfy and there were plenty of towels and pillows!!! Loved the snacks and little extras!!! property is amazing and if you needed more room they have the extra Airbnb next door too!!! Even saw deer walking through the yard in the evening!!! Danny checked in several times over email to make sure we had everything we needed.
A great, relaxing home in the hills and woods. Thanks for a great stay.
Very nice and comfortable home Clean and well equipped .
If we are ever back in the area, we sure hope this location is available for us!
This experience was better than awesome! Danny's a winner! Will definitely recommend to others and stay again soon! Loved our visit!

Danny was very accommodating, friendly, and professional. The home is warm, spotless, and inviting. It is extremely well-stocked, with many items going above and beyond. Our family felt right at home with plenty of space to visit and prepare a nice meal. The outside is beautiful with a fantastic yard for the kids to play in.
If we are ever in the area again, it will be our go-to because I can’t imagine any place that could have been nicer!

We had a great stay here. Was clean, inexpensive with no ridiculous cleaning fee, and quiet. Good view out the back as well. Plenty of useful kitchenware and towels for the bathroom. Master Bedroom bed was a bit saggy in the middle and the floor could have used a mopping, but not awful. We would stay again if the need arose.

Very nice and comfortable place to stay.
One of the nicer places we have stayed at.

Photos do not show how spacious the home actually is. Clean. A lot of extras (snacks, filtered water, toiletries, linens, games). We're a private, introverted family & this was more private than we expected being that the driveway is shared with the host. We felt very comfortable. Never knew they were there. Hosts were accommodating to last minute changes & very responsive.
Got to have an egg hunt for Easter for my granddaughter in the back yard. We enjoyed the stay! Much better than staying in a hotel like we normally do when we visit here.
Awesome place to stay. House was beautiful, and couldn’t ask for a better location. Highly recommend

everything was great from arrival to departure.
i feel very good

This is our second stay at Bearfoot Retreat and it was great.
The house was spotless and while we ate out mostly, I cannot imagine needing anything in the kitchen that wasn't there.
Nice back deck and convenient to our activities.
Danny has been great to communicate with and hope this is available for our next trip to Kingsport.
Nice place, close to everywhere we wanted to visit.
great place to stay. clean, well stock.

Great place to have a girls' weekend. The house was conveniently located to restaurants and the perfect size for 3 women. We appreciated the extra shampoo, spices in the kitchen, and Brita in the fridge. Thanks!

We had a great stay at Danny’s place! The home is very neat and clean and the location is great!! The home more than met our expectations and we would love to come back in the future! I highly recommend Danny’s place if you are in the Kingsport, TN area!
Great find, perfect place to relax and plenty of privacy.
Had a great stay at Danny’s place. Beautiful and clean. Will stay again. Thanks Danny!

My stay at the Bearfoot Retreat was exceptional. The picturesque surroundings, cozy atmosphere, and immaculate cleanliness of the property made me feel right at home. Attention to detail was beyond my expectations. I will definitely stay here again when/if I’m back in the area. Thank you for having me.
Beautiful location even in the dead of winter. Super convenient for us.
My family has stayed at this home multiple times. It’s prefect and always the first place I look for to check availability when coming in to visit family.
A real nice place, clean, well furnished and very comfortable.
Very beautiful home nice area everything was just like the pictures

those was the perfect spot for our family, we enjoyed the beautiful view and felt right at home. The amenities were amazing, plenty of things we needed! Also close to an area with nice restaurants and shopping.

Clean house, nice furniture, fast internet, peaceful location, and great amenities. Hosts were friendly and clearly put a lot of care into the property. Listing was even better than described and perfect for our family. We will gladly stay here again the next time we are visiting the area.

The Bearfoot Retreat was just as described. Danny was very helpful and quick to respond to any of my questions. We were there for Christmas to visit family. My husband grew up in Kingsport so we knew the area well. The home was very comfortable, nicely decorated and well stocked. And very Clean! The exterior and yard was well maintained and a pleasant place to spend time. The whole experience was great from start to finish. We hope to be able to spend time there in the future. Danny and Natasha thank you for being so accommodating and being such wonderful host. Kathy and David
We enjoyed our stay while visiting relatives in TN. Very nice and clean place. The house was stocked with essentials to make our stay comfortable.
This home was very well appointed with nice amenities…. All you could ask for in the kitchen .. plenty of towels washcloths and extra blankets… the home felt very comfortable to our family ….
Beautiful place to relax. Very clean and spacious area.
Danny was very responsive and very accommodating. We enjoyed our welcome board and the refreshments.

Danny’s place was one of the nicest & cleanest places I have stayed. The kitchen had everything you would need. The beds are very comfortable. My grandson was so excited to see all the wild turkeys. The Christmas decorations were an added bonus! Loved it.
Comfortable, clean home with plenty of parking. Great location - easy access to many restaurants and a grocery store. Kitchen was well stocked. Keurig coffee machine was convenient. Closets were big!
I thought the house was beautiful loved the inside and outside and can not wait to come back in the summer. Enjoyed time with family and house was well equipped with all you needed.

We absolutely loved this house. It was perfect for our family. There were tons of dishes, pots and pans, seasonings, oil, sugar so many things were provided. There were deer out back in the morning and they would walk out front and up the hige mountain thay was in total view of the picture window in living room. It was quiet and peaceful and absolutely wonderful. Our son lives in Kingsport and we have not all been together in over 2 years and it was so nice to have a big enough place for us to have a family game night and a Christmas dinner all together. The house is great. The beds are super comfortable, especially the room we stayed in which was not the primary. Closets are a good size and the decor was beautiful. Thank you again Danny for having us.
We have stayed at this location several times and it has always been a great experience. Won't stay anywhere else in Kingsport Highly recommend!!!
This is a beautiful retreat. It’s quiet and clean. Easy to get anywhere in Kingsport.
Perfect

This was a lovely place with plenty of room. Though we didn't cook in the kitchen it was fully stocked. It was very clean and a great location for what we had planned in the area. Close to town & restaurants. Private with a view of Bays Mountain. We even saw a deer & her fawn who was having fun running & playing in the woods. They even had water & some snacks for us. When needed they responded quickly & we would definitely stay here again. I highly recommend.
Wonderful stay! It could not have been better!
Clean, well stocked. Great location. Safe & secure.
Danny was a great host, with great communication and a beautiful home. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay!

From the first time I reached out to Danny until our last communication he was prompt and answered all my questions. Unfortunately with our schedule my friend and I did not meet him personally. However Danny did reach out to make sure we had everything we needed. His home is well laid out, spotless and very peaceful. We had the added pleasure of seeing deer throughout his neighborhood and as we were leaving (to go home) we saw thirteen (13) deer within two blocks. A little slice of heaven. I would definitely book again. Thank you again for a wonderful stay.

Mr. Danny was pretty responsive, accommodating, welcoming. The house is pretty, clean, inviting and peaceful. Totally recommend it. It has all necessities and extra. If we go back we will definitely consider this house again.
Thoughtful touches that the host left for us made this stay stand out to us. Welcome sign for Carolyn and family. Bowl of candy.
Beautiful area, loved the wilderness feel, birds, deer, squirrels

We absolutely love staying here. Danny and Natisha are so helpful and sweet. I will not stay anywhere else but here. I feel like I’m home . We saw deer and love how quiet it is. Always clean and they have everything you need , even a fan in every room!
We have stayed in B&B’s around the world. Danny’s home was the best yet!

We loved our stay. The house is tucked away at the top of the hill with 2 other homes. It’s surrounded by lush greenery and is very quiet. The beds were all very comfortable and we had everything we needed in the kitchen to prepare any type of meal. I especially enjoyed sitting on the porch area out front each morning with a cup of coffee reading my morning devotionals. Danny was quick to respond to my questions, even though the answers were already outlined in the house instructions.
we truly enjoyed staying in this Airb&b! it was comfy and convenient. The host was very responsive and helpful! may stay again soon :)
Very comfortable home.

Hard to put into words how much we loved this home. We brought my 83 yo mom to visit her remaining family.
She is particular, to say the least, and she LOVED this home. It exceeded our expectations. It's a hidden away piece of heaven at the top of Ridgefields. Accessibility in/out of the home as well as from the back bedroom onto the back porch for morning coffee, was superb. My uncle & aunt that have lived in Kingsport 70+ years were in awe of this place.
It's obvious this couple works hard to maintain this property. They go above & beyond and stock every room with necessity items, which I wasn't expecting. They are quick to respond with any questions or concerns.
It made what was already a special trip that much more special. I cannot thank them enough.
Very happy with our stay. Super clean. Quiet neighborhood. Host was welcoming and responsive.

The house is settled back in the
woods and is very very very peaceful. Great access to town and Danny is very responsive. The entire house is super comfy and lots of room inside and outside. We saw alot of wildlife!!! I would highly recommend staying at this residence.

This lovely home was everything we hoped for and more…. peaceful, quiet, and very clean.
Danny responded immediately to our questions about checkin and offered help if needed. We felt welcomed and cared for and the open living area was a perfect place for gathering with our Kingsport relatives.

Danny was a great host. Quick to respond with messages.
The toaster oven quit working while we were there and he replaced it the same day.
They brought over toys for my grandchildren which I thought was very thoughtful.
It's a very peaceful beautiful spot. Our first night, a doe and her twin fawns we walking through the backyard, just 20 yards from us.
Highly recommend
We loved our stay here. The house was very clean and well stocked.
House was extremely clean. Great location. Beautiful views. Danny was very responsive. 10/10 would recommend.
Absolutely loved this house! It was close to everything but close enough out for privacy. The host were very friendly and helpful with all our questions
This is our second stay, we feel like we found our perfect place to go when visiting family in Kingsport. It feels like a home away from home.
Thanks Danny, my family loved your home. It was pleasant and peaceful.

This stay was amazing.... This was by far the cleanest rental we've ever stayed in. We will definitely be looking to stay again when we are in the area. I would recommend this property to anyone looking to stay in the area
Very nice place. Wish we could’ve stayed longer, definitely recommend.

Book it!! It felt less like an Air BnB and more like we were staying with family. EVERYTHING was perfect! Super clean, extra details thought of, and the property was beyond private and safe. Fireflies in the evening, chirping birds in the gorgeous trees, Adirondack chairs on back porch. Truly idyllic! We were kicking ourselves for not booking this sweet little place longer as our rental house wasn’t quite ready. Would have loved to have stayed longer. Natisha and Danny made us feel so welcomed but never intruded upon. Danny gave us some great pointers for the area and Natisha’s grace for my talkative husband didn’t go unnoticed. Be prepared to truly be on vacation in this beautiful place.

Quiet and private location. Danny was very responsive and it was a pleasure to stay at this house.
Will definitely be back!
Beautiful home. Danny was very responsive & they made sure we didn’t need anything. It was very peaceful!! Definitely will book again.
Danny was very easy to work with when we needed to make changes to the reservation. Bearfoot Retreat is comfortable and a beautiful place to stay.
Great stay! The place was clean and the area was quiet. Beautiful views from the back porch!
This is the second time we have stayed and we absolutely love it. Could not ask for more of a homey place

Danny's Bearfoot Retreat is clean and cozy, private and scenically landscaped. There was a generous supply of yummy snacks, instructions were simple and light/fan switches are labeled. The house and back deck are very spacious and have plenty of comfortable seating. Danny was a great host and very accommodating to some special requests. His Retreat offers a pleasant, relaxing time away from home and is a superb value. We would definitely want to stay again when in the area to visit family.

This is a fabulous place to stay!! The house is in a perfect location and it outdid the description!! Danny was a great host!!! The little touches set this apart from most Airbnb. I would recommend this rental to everyone!!
Truly a retreat! We enjoyed the peaceful surroundings and beautiful woods. Thank you for your warm hospitality!

Danny's place is a jewel in the town of Kingsport. We made our travel arrangements around his availability. We cannot say enough good things about the place, the grounds and the kindness we were shown. If you are going to Kingsport or the surrounding areas, please check this place out! You will not be disappointed.
BeUtiful home. Kitchen fully stocked with equipment, not just odds and ends. Landscaping and outdoor areas so ni e you could spend a whole day just taking in the view.

very safe place to stay, we were able to leave our equipment, rods and reels on our boat during our stay. Would highly recommend.
Thanks for the snacks...
Henry

Danny was fantastic .
Very flexible on the check in, was extremely quick to reach out to any of my questions, did whatever was necessary to adjust to our needs!!
Loved the place, Perfectly quite, very relaxing, property ! Wish we could have stayed longer ! This was my first AB&B didn’t know how it was going to go put I will definitely do again !!
Can’t beat the price!!
Thank you Danny

Had a wonderful stay at Danny's place!
We were a bit surprised to receive an extra $100 charge midway through for our parents who joined us last minute, as the house had ample bedroom space for two additional adults, given that it was initially just my partner and I (with our baby and toddler) in a three bedroom house. Haven't been at another AirBnB where we have been charged for extra guests (although, I see now that it was in the house notes). Was a bit disappointing that the charge wasn't initially accompanied with a note from the host explaining why they were requesting additional money.
Other than that, the house was very homey and on such a beautiful property! We would definitely recommend the place and hope possibly to return if we're in the area!
We loved our stay at Danny’s place! Such a lovey hole in a quiet area with GORGEOUS surroundings! Very highly recommend!!!
